keywords.value: Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: As the festival industry grows, parents are starting to take their children with them — but not without some sidelong glances.

headline.print_headline: Rocking Out in the Mosh Pit, With Baby in Tow
headline.main: Rocking Out in the Mosh Pit, With Baby in Tow

snippet: As the festival industry grows, parents are starting to take their children with them — but not without some sidelong glances....
abstract: Music festival promoters are adding family-designated areas to accommodate fans who want to share cultural experience with offspring and do not want to miss event because they have children; some question appropriateness of bringing children and many attendees say they do not want to censor behavior for sake of kids; advice on bringing children to festivals offered.
